hanzi-su-wiki:
補

Значения

Пополнять, восполнять; помогать

Мнемоника

Главное 甫, в чём нуждается одежда 衣, ремонт, латание дыр, дополнение заплатами.

Варианты

补
purpleculture_pinyin:
bǔ
to repair; to patch; to mend; to make up for; to fill (a vacancy); to supplement
ремонтировать; патчить; чинить; восполнить; заполнить (вакансию); в дополнение
rtega_mnemonic:
補補RS
补补		repair, supplement, supply, nutritious, help, appoint to
  • clothes 衤 where something can grow through 甫 needs repair with a supply of cloth by a man 卜
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 补)
Pictophonetic: 甫 indicates the sound; 衤 (cloth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:

補償 [ bǔ cháng ]: to compensate; to make up

heisig_chinese_memo: A soldier needs to patch up his cloak from knife slashes, and patch up his dogtags from bullet holes.
heisig_constituent: supplement, cloak, dog-tag, arrowhead, screwdriver, utilize, utilise
Keyword_KANJIDIC: supplement, supply, make good, offset, compensate, assistant, learner
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: дополнение, поставка, делают хорошее, офсет, компенсации, ассистент, обучающийся
koohiiStory1: I usually hear supplement in "dietry supplement". So you´re given a cloak for extra fibre and dogtags for extra iron. Keeps you regular and stops you feeling tired and run-down.
koohiiStory2: The name and number printed on a soldier´s cloak is a supplement to his main I.D. tag; his dog-tag, in helping identify the soldier.
jp_example_words:
補給(ほきゅう): supply, supplying, replenishment
補強(ほきょう): compensation, reinforcement
補充(ほじゅう): supplementation, supplement, replenishment, replenishing
補助(ほじょ): assistance, support, aid, auxiliary
補償(ほしょう): compensation, reparation
補足(ほそく): supplement, complement
補う(おぎなう): compensate for
候補(こうほ): candidacy
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There is a spirit at your wedding. It's there as a supplement to the guests because not enough people came.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: It's weird that you supplemented your wedding guests with a spirit or two, but even if you hadn't invited them, they may have showed up anyway.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Along with the spirits to supplement your wedding guests, you made everyone carry a hoe (ほ). That way no one had to bring a date, they carry a garden hoe as a supplement and no one feels bad about being dateless. Everyone is!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Maybe you should supplement your wedding with other things next time... instead of spirits and garden hoes.
Ru_Meaning: supplement, supply, make good, offset, compensate, assistant, learner
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 甫 (はじ．めて、ホ впервые, сначала). Сравни: 捕 (とらえる、ホ хватать), 哺 (はぐくむ、ホ вскармливать).
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), 十 (десять), 用 (употреблять), 初 (первый)
Ru_trainchinese:
bǔ: (глаг) латать, чинить; добавлять, восполнять; укреплять
bǔ: (графема) (книжн.) приносить пользу, помогать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the first time (甫), the clothes (衤) are supplied
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A soldier needs to patch up his cloak from knife slashes, and patch up his dogtags from bullet holes.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " clothes " to " fu " sound. The original meaning is to repair clothes. "Shuowen": "Mending up, finishing clothes. From clothes, just sound." Such as "Book of Rites. "Inner Ze": "Clothes are torn, please patch up Renzhen." "Warring States Policy. "Zhongshan Strategy": "As for the genus of the Pingyuan monarch, all the wives and concubines are made to fill the gap between the ranks."

" Fill after" refers to repair, repair. Such as "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. The Eighteen Kinds of Laws of the Qin Dynasty" Jian 119-120: "The Fushan and Yuanshan of the Forbidden Garden in the county, the soil is evil and cannot rain. If there is bad in summer, don't make up for it. In autumn, there will be no (no) rain and sometimes use 𦅹( It means that the forbidden gardens maintained by the county are not limited to the distance to the mountain. If the soil is not good enough to withstand the rain, it will be damaged in the summer, and there is no need to gradually repair it. It should be built when there is no rain in the autumn. Another example is "Lu's Spring and Autumn. "Meng Qiu": "The palace is repaired, the walls are buried, and the city walls are replenished."

" Supplement " means to make up and remedy. Such as "Poetry. Daya. "Songmin": "There is a shortfall in the government office, and Wei Zhongshanfu makes up for it." Mao Chuan: "Zhongshanfu makes up for it, and it is good for the past." "Strengthening the country": "So the one who is good at the sun is king, the one who is good at the time is hegemony, the one who makes up for the leakage is in danger, and the one who is in the great famine is dead."

" Supplement " means subsidy or supplement. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "Sixteenth Year of Chenggong": "Zifan ordered the army officers to inspect the wounded, make up for the wounded, and carry on the soldiers, show the carts and horses, cock and eat, only to listen." "Han Feizi. "Guan Xing": "Therefore, the surplus is used to make up for the deficiencies, and the long and the short is the master.

" Complement " indicates the interest of coming benefits. Such as "Han Shu. "Dong Zhongshu Biography": "Anyone who has crumbs, sleeps in the night and sleeps in the night, and the ancients, will there be no supplement?" Yan Shi's ancient note: "Benefit, benefit." "Lun Heng. "Zi Ji": "Those who are used for the world, a hundred articles are harmless; those who are not used, a chapter has no supplement."

" Supplement " also means filling, and is mostly used for the transfer of officials to fill positions. Such as "Historical Records. Level Standards Book: "Anyone who enters the property makes up for an official, the shipper is punishable, the election tomb is late, shameless, the use of force, the law is strict." Filial Piety and Filial Piety": "The emperor came to ask questions in person, and chose to supplement the local officials."
humanum_short_description_en: From " clothes " to " fu " sound. The original meaning is to repair clothes, and then generally refers to repair and repair.
humanum_full_description:
從「衣」，「甫」聲。本義是修補衣服。《說文》：「補，完衣也。从衣，甫聲。」如《禮記．內則》：「衣裳綻裂，紉箴請補綴。」《戰國策．中山策》：「至於平原君之屬，皆令妻妾補縫於行伍之間。」

　　「補」後泛指修補、修復。如《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》簡119-120：「縣所葆禁苑之傅山、遠山，其土惡不能雨，夏有壞者，勿稍補繕，至秋毋（無）雨時而以𦅹（徭）為之。」意謂縣所維修的禁苑，不拘離山遠近，如因土質不佳不能耐雨，到夏季有毀壞，不必逐步補修，要到秋季無雨的時候興徭役修築。又如《呂氏春秋．孟秋》：「修宮室，坿墻垣，補城郭。」

　　「補」引申表示彌補、補救。如《詩．大雅．烝民》：「袞職有闕，維仲山甫補之。」毛傳：「仲山甫補之，善補過也。」《荀子．彊國》：「故善日者王，善時者霸，補漏者危，大荒者亡。」

　　「補」表示補助、補充。如《左傳．成公十六年》：「子反命軍吏察夷傷，補卒乘，繕甲兵，展車馬，雞鳴而食，唯命是聽。」《韓非子．觀行》：「故以有餘補不足，以長續短之謂明主。」

　　「補」表示禆益、益處。如《漢書．董仲舒傳》：「凡所為屑屑，夙興夜寐，務法上古者，又將無補與？」顏師古注：「補，益也。」《論衡．自紀》：「為世用者，百篇無害；不為用者，一章無補。」

　　「補」也表示填補，多用於官員的調任，填補職位。如《史記．平準書》：「入物者補官，出貨者除罪，選舉陵遲，廉恥相冒，武力進用，法嚴令具。」《後漢書．孝和孝殤帝紀》：「帝乃親臨策問，選補郎吏。」
humanum_short_description: 從「衣」，「甫」聲。本義是修補衣服，後泛指修補、修復。

①把殘破的東西加上材料修理完整：縫補。補葺。亡羊補牢。
②把缺少的東西充實起來或添上：彌補。補充。貼補。補習。滋補。
③益處：不無小補。於事無補。

從「 衣 」，「 甫 」聲。本義是修補衣服。《說文》：「補，完衣也。从衣，甫聲。」如《禮記．內則》：「衣裳綻裂，紉箴請補綴。」《戰國策．中山策》：「至於平原君之屬，皆令妻妾補縫於行伍之間。」 「 補 」後泛指修補、修復。如《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》簡119-120：「縣所葆禁苑之傅山、遠山，其土惡不能雨，夏有壞者，勿稍補繕，至秋毋（無）雨時而以𦅹（徭）為之。」意謂縣所維修的禁苑，不拘離山遠近，如因土質不佳不能耐雨，到夏季有毀壞，不必逐步補修，要到秋季無雨的時候興徭役修築。又如《呂氏春秋．孟秋》：「修宮室，坿墻垣，補城郭。」 「 補 」引申表示彌補、補救。如《詩．大雅．烝民》：「袞職有闕，維仲山甫補之。」毛傳：「仲山甫補之，善補過也。」《荀子．彊國》：「故善日者王，善時者霸，補漏者危，大荒者亡。」 「 補 」表示補助、補充。如《左傳．成公十六年》：「子反命軍吏察夷傷，補卒乘，繕甲兵，展車馬，雞鳴而食，唯命是聽。」《韓非子．觀行》：「故以有餘補不足，以長續短之謂明主。」 「 補 」表示禆益、益處。如《漢書．董仲舒傳》：「凡所為屑屑，夙興夜寐，務法上古者，又將無補與？」顏師古注：「補，益也。」《論衡．自紀》：「為世用者，百篇無害；不為用者，一章無補。」 「 補 」也表示填補，多用於官員的調任，填補職位。如《史記．平準書》：「入物者補官，出貨者除罪，選舉陵遲，廉恥相冒，武力進用，法嚴令具。」《後漢書．孝和孝殤帝紀》：「帝乃親臨策問，選補郎吏。」

補字的基本解释

補
bǔ
见“补”。

補字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǔ］
［《廣韻》博古切，上姥，幫。］
“补1”的繁体字。
(1)修治破衣使完整。
(2)泛指一切器物的修旧补损。
(3)补助；补充。
(4)弥补；补救。
(5)裨益。
(6)补养；滋补。
(7)谓官有缺位，选员补充。
(8)指官员调任。
(9)补子。
(10)古邑名。

補字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　補； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1117第30
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【正韻】博古切【集韻】【韻會】彼五切，?音圃。【說文】完衣也。【急就篇註】修破謂之補。【詩·大雅】袞職有闕，惟仲山甫補之。　又助也。【周禮·秋官·小行人】若國札䘮，則令賻補之。　又益也。【前漢·董仲舒傳】凡所爲屑屑，夙興夜寐，務法上古者，又將無補與。　又數也。【韻會】十兆曰經，十經曰垓，十垓曰補。　又邑名。【鄭語】鄢、蔽、補、丹、依、㽥、歷、莘，君之土也。【註】八邑也。　又姓。【通志·氏族略】補氏。【正字通】唐中常侍補眞。㽥字比照考証蔽字條改正。

補字的源字形

字源演变：

bǔ
See "complement".
Make up
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [bǔ]
["Guangyun" Boguqie, grandma, help. ]
The traditional characters of "補1".
(1) Repair and repair broken clothes to make them complete.
(2) Generally refers to the repair and repair of all utensils.
(3) Subsidy; supplement.
(4) Make up; remedy.
(5) Benefits.
(6) Nourish; nourish.
(7) It is said that there are vacancies in the officials, and the selection of staff will be added.
(8) Refers to the transfer of officials.
(9) Tonic.
(10) The name of the ancient town.

[Anxiety to the post] The repair of the broken predicate is a supplement. 【Poetry·Daya】There is a shortage of government office, but Zhongshanfu makes up for it.　Yesukeya. 【Zhou Li·Qiuguan·Xiao Xingren】If the country Zhashang, order to make up for it.　Youyiye. [Previous Han·Dong Zhongshu Biography] Anyone who has crumbs and crumbs, sleeps sleeplessly at night, and the ancients, will have no remedy.　Count it again. 【Yunhui】Ten zhao is called classics, ten classics are called gai, and ten gai is supplemented.　Also known as the town. Make up
Name meaning
Nothing.
bǔ
вм. 补
Radicals: ネ, 甫  (spirit, wedding)
Meaning Mnemonic
There is a spirit at your wedding. It's there as a supplement to the guests because not enough people came.
It's weird that you supplemented your wedding guests with a spirit or two, but even if you hadn't invited them, they may have showed up anyway.
Reading Mnemonic
Along with the spirits to supplement your wedding guests, you made everyone carry a hoe (ほ). That way no one had to bring a date, they carry a garden hoe as a supplement and no one feels bad about being dateless. Everyone is!
Maybe you should supplement your wedding with other things next time... instead of spirits and garden hoes.
